divs: Sighting DetailsIt was 3.25am,i was having a cigarette out my bedroom window as i couldnt sleep,when i saw a bright light up in the sky,i can only describe it as a shooting star,but it was much bigger and moving quite slow,i watched it for a few seconds untill it just dissapeard,it was then i checked the time,it was 3.28am.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bromsgrove
This sighting has never been favorited.
